ygData.subject: Human SK Quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: Although I m a DE SK, I d like to do some human SK quests in Freeport and Queynos, but don t know any other than the Groflah/note quest. My reasoning behind
ygData.messageBody:
Although I'm a DE SK, I'd like to do some human SK quests in Freeport
and Queynos, but don't know any other than the Groflah/note quest.
My reasoning behind this is that I've done everything I can in Neriak,
and would like to believe that we have a cool Unholy sword quest similar
to Soulfire. Since I haven't seen much in Neriak, and humans are the
least popular race of one of the least popular classes, I figured there
might be some overlooked quests, that maybe lead up to something good.

I don't really want full quest spoilers, just suggestions of what's
out there and who to talk to (and where).

Xilith
